documentType: evidence inventory and chain of custody form
summary: This is an FBI evidence inventory and chain of custody form (FD-1087) for a box of evidence related to case 31E-MM-108062. The evidence includes audio tapes, a photo lineup, and various papers (flight info, phone numbers, names) collected from Palm Beach Police Department investigations (PBPD case numbers). The document tracks the evidence's collection, transfer to New York, and subsequent custody changes up to an inventory in 2021.

persons.name: Joe Recarey
persons.context: Detective from whom the evidence was collected on 08/28/2006. The evidence was collected from his address in Palm Beach, FL.

events.title: Evidence Collection from Palm Beach PD
events.description: A box of evidence items, including audio tapes, a photo lineup, and various documents, was collected from Detective Joe Recarey of the Palm Beach Police Department.

events.title: Evidence Inventory
events.description: The evidence box was inventoried, noting its contents and chain of custody history.

locations: 345 South County Road, Palm Beach, FL, 33480
keyFacts: The evidence box contains materials from Palm Beach Police Department (PBPD) investigations, including audio tapes (e.g., 'TAPED CONVERSATION PBPD 05-237'), a photo lineup, and documents with flight information and initials/names (e.g., N.M., J.B., C.W., G.).
The evidence was originally collected from Detective Joe Recarey of the Palm Beach PD on August 28, 2006, and was later transferred to New York.
The document is a chain of custody record showing the evidence was handled by multiple individuals and offices (Miami, New York) over time, with the last recorded inventory on July 20, 2021.
